p: In an experiment, among five antifungal volatiles (hexan-1-ol, benzaldehyde, 2-nonanone, (Z)-hex-3-en-1-ol and (E)-hex-2-enal) released by raspberry and strawberry fruits, (E)-hex-2-enal and benzaldehyde were the most effective against three fungal ( A. alternata, B. cinerea, and Colletotrichum gloeosporioides) species in vitro [ 20].
